data.event: In 1853, the Gadsden Purchase extended American territory well south of the Gila.
He came to Arizona Territory in 1866 as a U.S. Indian Agent.

event.title: secured a post office in August

data.event: With the aid of Governor R.C. McCormick, he secured a post office in August of the same year.

event.title: was discovered at the Silver King Mine in 1875

data.event: Florence became the government seat of Pinal County Courthouse in the newly formed Pinal County and silver was discovered at the Silver King Mine in 1875.
